title: Ola | SDE 3 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech CS from tier 2 college
Years of Experience: 9.2 yrs
Prior Experience:  Start Up
Company: OLA(OLA Electric specifically)
Title/Level: SDE-3(Mobile Developer)
Location: Bangalore
Base Salary: Rs. 55,00,000
Relocation/Signing Bonus: Rs. 0
Stock bonus: Rs. 3,00,000
Variable Pay : 5,00,000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock) ~ Rs. 61,00,000(Yearly)
Benefits: Standard benefits
Other details: No other offer yet. (Asked for SDE-4 but they are saying it will be for 11+ years of experience)


Could you all? please help me with 

1. OLA culture
2. Salary I should ask(stocks seems low)
